headline: Investment Income: A Quiet Growth Driver for Progressive?
summary: Progressive's $80.3B portfolio, driven by fixed-income gains, quietly powers earnings alongside strong underwriting results.

raw.headline: Investment Income: A Quiet Growth Driver for Progressive?
raw.summary: Progressive's $80.3B portfolio, driven by fixed-income gains, quietly powers earnings alongside strong underwriting results.

headline: AM Best Affirms Credit Ratings of The Travelers Companies, Inc. and Main Subsidiaries
summary: OLDWICK, N.J., August 08, 2025--AM Best has affirmed the Financial Strength Rating (FSR) of A++ (Superior) and the Long-Term Issuer Credit Ratings (Long-Term ICR) of "aa+" (Superior) of the main subsidiaries of The Travelers Companies, Inc. (TRV) (headquartered in New York, NY) [NYSE: TRV], collectively known as Travelers Group (Travelers). In addition, AM Best has affirmed the FSR of A++ (Superior) and the Long-Term ICRs of "aa+" (Superior) of Travelers Casualty and Surety Company of America (T
